content:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------- **

leg warmers

** --------------------------------------------------------------------------- *wear these cozy legwarmers over flats under boots or barefoot around the house pair them with a cute skirt a pretty dress jeans or tights or leggings the possibilities are endless * *this pattern includes a link to an instructional video on the magic loop method these simple legwarmers serve as an excellent starter pattern for learning this fun and fast method of knitting in the round * **yarn** 100g skein of cascade yarns heathers 220 shown in colour 9408 220yds **needles** 5 mm dpns or long circular needle for magic loop method **notions** yarn needle **finished measurements** 7 5 inch circumference unstretched x 14 25 inches long **pattern notes** these simple legwarmers are designed to use up every last inch of one skein of cascade 220 if you prefer not to unravel your swatch you will need to purchase an additional skein
